Práce s daty


      
      
Python

# Load the Pandas library with alias 'pd' 
import pandas as pd 

# Read data from url 'https://opendata.mfcr.cz/exports/prezkum/csv' 
data = pd.read_csv("https://opendata.mfcr.cz/exports/prezkum/csv") 

# Preview the first 5 lines of the loaded data 
data.head()



  






NodeJS







  
    content_copy
    check_circle
  

  

    

const request = require("request");
const csv = require("csv-parse")();

csv.on("data", row => {
  // process one row
})

csv.on("end", () => {
  // relax
})

csv.on("error", () => {
  // panic!
})

request("https://opendata.mfcr.cz/exports/prezkum/csv").pipe(csvParse());
